project.description: this job is used for dell_c6320 release build

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
../infrasim_build/shell/infrasim_repo_clone.sh ${tag} cp -f ../infrasim_build/mkfiles/*.mk ${WORKSPACE}/idic/pdk/content/mkfiles/
echo "start to do the build" [ -d utilities ] && rm -rf utilities git clone git@eos2git.cec.lab.emc.com:InfraSIM/utilities.git if [ -d utilities ]; then cp utilities/build/build.sh ./ else echo "failed to clone utilities" exit 1 fi
./build.sh ${HW_TYPE}
echo "start to generate the OVA file"
pushd tools
BRANCH=`echo ${tag} | awk -F '_' '{print $1}' `
pushd ova_builder sudo ./ova_builder.sh -d ../../idic/pdk/linux/${HW_TYPE}/ -t vbmc_${HW_TYPE}_${BRANCH}_${BUILD_NUMBER}.ova if [ ! -f vbmc_${HW_TYPE}_${BRANCH}_${BUILD_NUMBER}.ova ]; then echo "OVA file is not generated" exit 1 fi sudo chmod 777 vbmc_${HW_TYPE}_${BRANCH}_${BUILD_NUMBER}.ova popd
echo "start to generate the box" pushd virtualbox_builder sudo ./virtualbox_builder.sh -d ../../idic/pdk/linux/${HW_TYPE}/ -n ${HW_TYPE} popd popd
